attributes.action: immediately ban Operation Stack on the M20.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We pay a lot of money to the treasury through fuel duty and road tax. It is not right that our roads become car parks when industrial action occurs in France. It would be better to use the hard shoulder for lorries, close the inside lane and enforce a reduced speed limit for the two outside lanes, thereby allowing the free movement of people in Kent who are the unwitting victims of foreign industrial action.
